name: 3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate:NAD+ oxidoreductase (CoA-mehtylpropanoylating)
definition: 3-Methyl-2-oxobutanoic acid + CoA + NAD+ <=> 2-Methylpropanoyl-CoA + CO2 + NADH + H+
comment: multi-step reaction possibly identical to branched-chain alpha-keto acid dehydrogenase complex (see R01701+R02662+R07618)
